---
title: "Hot Dried Noodles <br> 干拌面"
categories: [Carbs, Spicy]
image: ./Images/hot-dried-noodles.jpg
---

### 🥣 Ingredients | 用料

| Ingredient | 用料 | Amount | 份量 |
|------------|------|--------|------|
| Noodles | 面条 | As needed | 适量 |
| Chili soy sauce (or spicy dipping sauce) | 鲜辣露 | 1 spoon | 一勺 |
| Light soy sauce | 生抽 | 2 spoons | 两勺 |
| Peanut butter | 花生酱 | 1 spoon | 一勺 |
| Vinegar | 醋 | ½ spoon | 一小勺 |
| Sesame oil | 香油 | 1 spoon | 一勺 |
| Ground meat | 肉沫 | 50 g | 50克 |
| Cooking wine | 料酒 | ½ spoon | 一小勺 |
| Scallion | 葱 | 1 stalk | 一根 |
| Garlic | 蒜 | 2 cloves | 两瓣 |
| Salt | 盐 | To taste | 适量 |

### 🍴️ Steps | 步骤
1. Finely chop garlic and scallion, set aside.  
 蒜和葱切碎备用。
2. Heat oil in a pan, stir-fry ground meat until browned, add cooking wine and stir. Add garlic and salt to taste, then remove and set aside.  
 热锅烧油后加入肉沫，炒开后加入料酒翻炒。加入蒜和适量盐调味。乘出备用。
3. In a large bowl, add chili soy sauce, soy sauce, peanut butter, vinegar, and sesame oil.  
 碗中加入鲜辣露，生抽，花生酱，醋和香油。
4. Boil water and cook the noodles until done. Transfer noodles to the bowl.  
 锅中加水烧沸煮面，熟后放入碗中。
5. Top with prepared meat and chopped scallion, mix thoroughly, and serve.  
 碗中加入葱和炒好的肉末，搅拌均匀即可食用。
